Class ClientImplementation

java.lang.Object

java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
org.projectsw.Distributed.ClientImplementation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, Client
public class ClientImplementation extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Client, Serializable
The implementation of the client interface.

      Constructs a new ClientImplementation instance with the specified port and server.

    • ClientImplementation

      public ClientImplementation(int port, RMIClientSocketFactory csf, RMIServerSocketFactory ssf, Server server) throws RemoteException
      Constructs a new ClientImplementation instance with the specified port, client socket factory, server socket factory, and server.
      Parameters:
      port - the port on which to export the remote object
      csf - the client socket factory for creating client sockets
      ssf - the server socket factory for creating server sockets
      server - the server to register the client with
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • update

      public void update(ResponseMessage response) throws RemoteException
      Updates the user interface (either TextualUI or GraphicalUI) with the given ResponseMessage. If the TextualUI is available, it is updated with the response; otherwise, the GraphicalUI is updated.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Client
      Parameters:
      response - the ResponseMessage to update the user interface with
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
